cast.name: 弗兰琪丝卡·佩特 Franziska Petri

writer.name: 巴斯蒂安·科普夫 Bastian Köpf

introduction: 43分钟的电影《Off Season》，描述了一对夫妇在休季的状态，在他们的孩子出生之前不久。格雷戈在西西里岛和他的女朋友朱迪思度假，但是朱迪思宁愿去工作也不愿躺在海滩上。她男朋友对婴儿的期望和他对家庭生活的渴望在两者之间创造了一个更大的距离。The 43-minute fiction film Off Season (prod: Film University Babelsberg KONRAD WOLF) by Henning Beckhoff describes the state of a couple in the off season, shortly before the birth of their child. Gregor (Godehard Giese) surprises his girlfriend Judith (Franziska Petri) with a wellness holiday in Sicily, but Judith would rather go to work than lie on the beach. Her boyfriend’s expectations with regard to the baby and his eagerness for family life create an ever-greater distance between the two.
